verses.verse: O <S%H430>God<s%>, you are my <S%H410>God<s%>; early will I <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H5315>you<s%>: my soul <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H1320>you<s%>, my flesh <S%H3642>longs<s%> for you in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, where <S%H1097>no<s%> water <S%H4325>is<s%>;
To <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H5797>power<s%> and your <S%H3519>glory<s%>, so as I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> you in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
Because your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2416>life<s%>, my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall praise <S%H7623>you<s%>.
Thus will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> you while I <S%H2416>live<s%>: I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in your <S%H8034>name<s%>.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> as with <S%H2459>marrow<s%> and <S%H1880>fatness<s%>; and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> you with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>:
When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> you upon my <S%H3326>bed<s%>, and <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on you in the night <S%H821>watches<s%>.
Because you have been my <S%H5833>help<s%>, therefore in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> follows <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3225>you<s%>: your right hand upholds <S%H8551>me<s%>.
But those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, to <S%H7722>destroy<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>, shall go into the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
They shall <S%H5064>fall<s%> by the <S%H3027>sword<s%>: they shall be a <S%H4521>portion<s%> for <S%H7776>foxes<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>; every one that <S%H7650>swears<s%> by him shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall be <S%H5534>stopped<s%>.
